achievements.name: Until Death Do Us Part
achievements.description: Marry another character

achievements.name: Way of Life
achievements.description: Complete an entire Lifestyle (all three trees)

achievements.name: A Legacy to Last the Ages
achievements.description: Complete an entire Dynasty Legacy

achievements.name: A House of My Own
achievements.description: Create a Cadet Branch of your Dynasty

achievements.name: Dreadful Ruler
achievements.description: Have the maximum amount of dread

achievements.name: Stressful Situation
achievements.description: Suffer from a Mental Break

achievements.name: Not So Feudal System
achievements.description: Use the Claim Throne scheme successfully

achievements.name: The Succession is Safe
achievements.description: Have ten living children

achievements.name: Álmost There
achievements.description: As Álmos Árpád, form Hungary and convert to Christianity

achievements.name: Last Count, First King
achievements.description: Starting as Duke Nuño of Portucale in 1066, form Portugal

achievements.name: Prolific
achievements.description: Have one hundred living dynasty members

achievements.name: A Name Known Throughout the World
achievements.description: Have your dynasty reach the highest possible Level of Splendor

achievements.name: End of an Era
achievements.description: Play until 1453

achievements.name: Turning to Diamonds
achievements.description: Reach the highest possible Stress level

achievements.name: Reconquista
achievements.description: Starting as an Iberian Christian, convert all of Iberia to Christianity

achievements.name: Seven Holy Cities
achievements.description: As a Hindu ruler, hold all seven Hindu Holy Sites at the same time

achievements.name: Frankokratia
achievements.description: As a French Catholic, hold the Kingdom of Thessalonika without being vassalised to Byzantium

achievements.name: Celebrity
achievements.description: Reach the highest possible Prestige Level

achievements.name: Saint
achievements.description: Reach the highest possible Piety Level

achievements.name: Keeping it in the Family
achievements.description: Have a child with the Inbred trait

achievements.name: Non Nobis Domine
achievements.description: Found a Holy Order

achievements.name: Trapped in the Web
achievements.description: Have strong hooks on three direct vassals

achievements.name: Followed by Shadows
achievements.description: Know ten secrets simultaneously

achievements.name: What Nepotism?
achievements.description: Have your Dynasty rule ten independent realms of at least Kingdom tier simultaneously

achievements.name: Rise from the Ashes
achievements.description: Restore the Roman Empire

achievements.name: The Emerald Isle
achievements.description: Starting as an Irish ruler, hold the Kingdom of Ireland

achievements.name: From Rags to Riches
achievements.description: Starting as a Count, lead your line to rule an Empire

achievements.name: Give a Dog a Bone
achievements.description: Starting as Matilda di Canossa in 1066, rule Italy, have 50 Dynasty members, and found a Holy Order

achievements.name: Al-Andalus
achievements.description: Starting as an Iberian Muslim, control Iberia and take the Avenge the Battle of Tours decision

achievements.name: Wily as the Fox
achievements.description: Starting as Robert the Fox in 1066, rule Sicily, hold a Greek Kingdom, and convert it to Catholicism

achievements.name: Sibling Rivalry
achievements.description: Starting as any of the Jimena siblings in 1066, become Emperor of Spain

achievements.name: Blood Eagle
achievements.description: Starting as any child of Ragnarr Lothbrok, conquer all of the British Isles

achievements.name: Kings to the Seventh Generation
achievements.description: Starting as Count Eudes of Anjou in 867, lead your Dynasty to rule the Kingdom of France

achievements.name: Norman Yoke
achievements.description: Starting as William in 1066, win the Invasion, become English, and have only English vassals

achievements.name: Royal Dignity
achievements.description: Starting as Vratislav Přemyslid in 1066, lead your Dynasty to rule Bohemia and the Holy Roman Empire

achievements.name: Going Places
achievements.description: As Haesteinn of Montaigu in 867, hold any Kingdom tier title

achievements.name: Land of the Rus
achievements.description: Starting as Rurik the Troublemaker in 867, lead your dynasty to rule the Empire of Russia

achievements.name: Above God
achievements.description: Have a strong hook on your Head of Faith

achievements.name: Paragon of Virtue
achievements.description: Have three or more virtuous traits

achievements.name: The Things Love Does for Us
achievements.description: Have a lover save you from a murder attempt

achievements.name: Fine Print
achievements.description: Use a hook to modify a feudal contract

achievements.name: Know Your Place
achievements.description: Defeat a faction in a war

achievements.name: Monumental
achievements.description: Fully upgrade a duchy capital building anywhere in your personal domain

achievements.name: It's not a Cult!
achievements.description: Create a Faith

achievements.name: The Things We Do for Love
achievements.description: Murder your lover's spouse

achievements.name: An Unfortunate Accident
achievements.description: Inherit a title from someone you murdered

achievements.name: Death Did Us Part
achievements.description: Murder your spouse

achievements.name: For the Faith!
achievements.description: Take part in a successful Great Holy War, on either side

achievements.name: Bad Blood
achievements.description: Go to war with one of your siblings over a Claim

achievements.name: Seductive
achievements.description: As any one character, successfully seduce ten people

achievements.name: The Emperor's New Clothes
achievements.description: While holding any empire title, be naked

achievements.name: A Perfect Circle
achievements.description: Have only two distinct parents, grandparents, and great grandparents

achievements.name: Carolingian Consolidation
achievements.description: Starting as a Karling, be the only independent Karling to hold a landed title

achievements.name: Moving up in the World
achievements.description: Increase your Rank

achievements.name: Beacon of Progress
achievements.description: Have your culture unlock all innovations, excluding regional and culture-specific innovations

achievements.name: Mother of us All
achievements.description: Starting as Daurama Daura, have your line reform an African faith, and convert all of Africa to it

achievements.name: Far from Home
achievements.description: As a Norse-Asatru ruler, have your capital on any island in the Indian Ocean

achievements.name: Miklagarðaríki
achievements.description: As an Asatru, hold all of the original Thessalonika, and any empire title other than Byzantium

achievements.name: Canute the Greater
achievements.description: As an unreformed tribal, form the North Sea Empire

achievements.name: King of all the Isles
achievements.description: As a North Germanic Asatru, control all islands in the Atlantic and the Mediterranean, whilst keeping your realm size below a certain threshold

achievements.name: Faster than the Fox
achievements.description: As a Norse tribal, control the entirety of Sicily

achievements.name: Völva
achievements.description: Starting and staying as a North Germanic Asatru of any kind, take the Found Witch Coven Decision

achievements.name: Saga in Stone
achievements.description: As any one dynasty, commission a hundred rune stones

achievements.name: First of the Crusader Kings
achievements.description: As a Christian North Germanic, participate in the very first crusade from the start

achievements.name: Vladimir's Second Choice
achievements.description: As a North Germanic or Russian Asatruan of any kind, convert to any Islamic faith & convert all of Russia.

achievements.name: A Dangerous Business
achievements.description: As a dwarf, win a Varangian Adventurer war anywhere outside of Europe

achievements.name: Patronage
achievements.description: Fund an Inspired character's Project, and receive the end result

achievements.name: Converging Paths
achievements.description: Create a Hybrid Culture

achievements.name: Changing Course
achievements.description: Create a Divergent Culture

achievements.name: Hoarder
achievements.description: Have an artifact in every slot in the Inventory and Court

achievements.name: Crème de la Crème
achievements.description: Reach the maximum amount of Court Grandeur

achievements.name: Polyglot
achievements.description: Personally know 10 languages

achievements.name: Inspirational
achievements.description: Sponsor 30 successful inspirations in one game

achievements.name: One of a Kind
achievements.description: Obtain a mythological rarity artifact from an Adventurer Inspiration

achievements.name: True Tolerance
achievements.description: Rule a realm containing at least 10 cultures with 95% or more acceptance of your culture

achievements.name: Delusions of Grandeur
achievements.description: Be at least 6 levels above your expected Court Grandeur

achievements.name: Bod Chen Po
achievements.description: As a member of the Pugyel Dynasty, re-create the Empire of Tibet

achievements.name: Turkish Eagle
achievements.description: As the Seljuk Count in Samosata, form Rum and create a Hybrid Culture between Oghuz and Greek

achievements.name: Rise of the Ghurids
achievements.description: Starting as the Duke of Ghur in 867 or 1066, conquer the borders of the historical Ghurid Empire

achievements.name: Brave and Bold
achievements.description: As the Piasts in 867, rule a Feudal Poland and own a Famed+ regalia, crown, weapon, and armor

achievements.name: Lingua Franca
achievements.description: Have every Royal Court speak your Court Language

achievements.name: Beta Israel
achievements.description: Starting and staying as a Jewish ruler in East Africa, rule a Kingdom and diverge your culture

achievements.name: They Belong in a Museum
achievements.description: Appoint a character with a completed Adventure inspiration as your Antiquarian

achievements.name: I Made This
achievements.description: Loot an artifact you do not have a claim on and pass it down to your heir

achievements.name: Nobody Comes to Fika
achievements.description: With the County of Fika as your primary title, diverge your culture and spread it to 30 Counties

achievements.name: The True Royal Court
achievements.description: As a vassal king to an emperor, have a higher court grandeur than they do

achievements.name: History's Best Friends
achievements.description: Sleep with your best friend while having the "Ritualized Friendship" cultural tradition

achievements.name: Basque In My Glory
achievements.description: Embrace the Basque paganism faith during the Iberian struggle

achievements.name: Friendship Is Magic
achievements.description: Use a friendship hook on a different-faith ruler involved in the Iberian struggle

achievements.name: High Stakes
achievements.description: Bet a title on a strategy game match against another ruler

achievements.name: Iberia or Iberia?
achievements.description: As an Iberian culture character, control all of the Caucasian Iberia region

achievements.name: The Andalusian Inquisition
achievements.description: Convert all of Iberia to the Mozarabic faith

achievements.name: Iberian Hostilities
achievements.description: End the Iberian struggle through means of force

achievements.name: Iberian Conciliation
achievements.description: End the Iberian struggle by setting your differences aside

achievements.name: Iberian Compromise
achievements.description: End the Iberian struggle through compromise

achievements.name: Holidaying in Iberia
achievements.description: Start as an uninvolved character, become involved and end the Iberian struggle

achievements.name: Legacy of The Campeadores
achievements.description: Create and rule the kingdom of Valencia as an heir to El Cid

achievements.name: The Grandest Tour
achievements.description: Visit ten Kingdom Tier Vassals on a Grand Tour

achievements.name: Your Eternal Reward
achievements.description: As a Regent, sucessfully coup your liege to take their Realm without War or Schemes

achievements.name: Imperial March
achievements.description: As an Emperor, go on an Intimidation Tour visiting all of your Powerful Vassals

achievements.name: Black Dinner
achievements.description: Successfully host a Murder Feast or Bloody Wedding

achievements.name: There and Back Again
achievements.description: Finish both tracks of the Traveler Trait

achievements.name: The Very Best
achievements.description: Finish any track in the Hastiluder Trait

achievements.name: Like No One Ever Was
achievements.description: Finish all tracks in the Hastiluder Trait

achievements.name: A Thousand and One Night
achievements.description: Orchestrate a Grand Wedding where the Spouses become Soulmates

achievements.name: A Knight's Tale
achievements.description: Have one of your Lowborn Knights win a Grand Tournament Joust, then land them

achievements.name: Hunting Accident
achievements.description: Succeed with the Murder Intent while on a Hunt

achievements.name: Lions and Tigers and Bears, Oh My!
achievements.description: Capture a large wild animal while on a Hunt

achievements.name: Fly, My Pretty!
achievements.description: Finish the Falconer track in the Hunter Trait

achievements.name: Pathway to Heaven
achievements.description: With one Character, go on Pilgrimages to all of your Holy Sites

achievements.name: Sir Lance-a-Lot
achievements.description: Participate in a Joust with a maxed out Horse track for the Hastiluder Trait

achievements.name: I'm in my Element(s)
achievements.description: Pass through every Terrain, including naval, whilst on the same Travel

achievements.name: Ahab
achievements.description: Succeed at a Legendary Hunt

achievements.name: Little William Marshal
achievements.description: Win every Contest at a Grand Tournament with at least three Contests

achievements.name: A True and Perfect Knight
achievements.description: Have a max rank Acclaimed Knight with the Warrior of the Faith Trait

achievements.name: A.E.I.O.U. and Me
achievements.description: Starting as the Habsburgs, rule the Archduchy of Austria, plan 5+ Grand Weddings and don't wage War

achievements.name: The Iron and Golden King
achievements.description: Have a capital Barony with 60+ income, a stationed 500+ Heavy Cavalry Regiment and a mine

achievements.name: Royal Flush
achievements.description: As a character of a faith with the Fadaeyeen Doctrine, dispose of a Lowborn, a King and an Emperor

achievements.name: Fiscal Responsibility
achievements.description: Fill Five Tax Collector slots with excellent Aptitude characters

achievements.name: Iranian Revival
achievements.description: Take the Iranian Resurgence ending in the Iranian Intermezzo Struggle

achievements.name: Abbasid Might
achievements.description: Take the Renew Caliphate ending in the Iranian Intermezzo Struggle

achievements.name: Darius' Revenge
achievements.description: As a character of Iranian Heritage, hold the Empire of Persia, Kingdom of Thessalonika, and Kingdom of Hellas

achievements.name: Mulct Them Dry
achievements.description: Loot four Illustrious-Tier Vizier Extravagance Modifiers from your Vizier

achievements.name: Rich in Diversity
achievements.description: As a character of a Faith with Jizya or Tax Nonbelievers Doctrines, have ten Vassals of other faiths

achievements.name: The Ummayad Strikes Back
achievements.description: Starting as a member of the Umayyad Dynasty, hold the Empire of Arabia and the Sunni Caliphate

achievements.name: Shia Reborn
achievements.description: Take the 'Found a New Caliphate' foundation as part of the Abbassid Humiliation ending in the Iranian Intermezzo Struggle

achievements.name: All Your Caliphate Are Belong To Us
achievements.description: Take the 'Dominate the Caliph' foundation as part of the Abbasid Humiliation ending in the Iranian Intermezzo Struggle

achievements.name: Not Today
achievements.description: Contract, and recover from, the Bubonic Plague

achievements.name: Divine Right
achievements.description: Reach the maximum level of Legitimacy

achievements.name: You'll Never Take Me Alive!
achievements.description: Travel to a safe holding while your Capital is infected by a Epidemic

achievements.name: The Pharaoh Islands
achievements.description: As a Scottish character, complete a Legend claiming your descent from Ancient Egypt

achievements.name: Canonized
achievements.description: Manage to make your Legend Protagonist a Saint

achievements.name: Upward Mobility
achievements.description: Successfully claim your Liege's title while having a higher Legitimacy Level than them

achievements.name: Can't Touch This
achievements.description: Have an infected Barony at the maximum Epidemic Resistance

achievements.name: Legendary!
achievements.description: Complete a Legend

achievements.name: Pay Respects
achievements.description: Host a Funeral for your Legend Protagonist

achievements.name: Local Legend
achievements.description: As a Count, complete a Mythical Legend

achievements.name: Neverending Story
achievements.description: Complete your ancestor's Legend after their death

achievements.name: The old man of the mountain
achievements.description: Complete Hassan-i Sabahs unique content by destroying an Empire

achievements.name: Band of Brothers
achievements.description: Have every camp followers temperament be positive and have at least 10 camp followers

achievements.name: Mio Cid
achievements.description: Complete El Cid's unique content with the 'An Honorable Man' ending

achievements.name: Birthright
achievements.description: As a Legitimist Adventurer, win a claim war for a Kingdom or Empire

achievements.name: Historically Inaccurate
achievements.description: Choose to set out on an Adventure as a spawned Historical Character

achievements.name: Quantum Leap
achievements.description: Choose a New Destiny 5 times in the same campaign

achievements.name: Kingdom of Heaven
achievements.description: As Baudouin of Jerusalem in 1178, defeat Saladin in a war

achievements.name: New Management, same as the Old Management
achievements.description: As an Islamic Sultanate of Rum, adopt Administrative Government while owning Constantinople

achievements.name: Rags to Riches to Rags to Riches
achievements.description: Starting as a Count, rule an Empire, become an Adventurer, then rule an Empire again

achievements.description: As Princess Tamar, rule all of Georgia and fully Conquer Armenia and Daylam

achievements.name: Despoiler of Byzantium
achievements.description: Become the Emperor of a newly-formed Latin Empire through a Crusade

achievements.name: Chaos is a Ladder
achievements.description: Become a Dominant Family within Byzantium

achievements.name: Epic Paperwork
achievements.description: Adopt the Administrative Government via Decision

achievements.name: Against the Odds
achievements.description: Starting in 1178, Re-Establish the Theodosian Borders

achievements.name: In Good Estate
achievements.description: Upgrade your Estate with a lvl 5 Villa and fill all external slots

achievements.name: It's OK, I Got a Permit
achievements.description: As a non-Powerful family, buy a Remit and successfully Raid the Estate of a Powerful Family

achievements.name: Despotic
achievements.description: As Co-Emperor, rule a Despotate

achievements.name: Byzywork
achievements.description: Have five simultaneous House members as Theme governors (not including you) while not being the Emperor

achievements.name: Started from the Bottom now we're ERE

achievements.description: Starting as Temüjin, conquer the world

achievements.description: Have 30 Tributaries

achievements.name: This Chinggis Everything
achievements.description: Become the Greatest of Khans

achievements.name: Steppe by Steppe
achievements.description: Migrate from the eastern Steppe to the western Steppe

achievements.name: In Xanadu
achievements.description: Build a Pleasure Dome

achievements.name: Settling In
achievements.description: Settle in the Steppe

achievements.name: Blood of my Blood
achievements.description: Become Blood Brothers

achievements.name: Con-fed-up

achievements.name: Shut Up, Nerge
